name: Ground Control (itch)
description:
CONCEPT:

Ground Control is an arcade-styled shoot-em-up made with the Mercury game library. The gameplay itself is simply about shooting down attack balloons during World War IV, in which technology has digressed after the nuclear catastrophe that ended World War III.

It's pretty simple, but fun as hell.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to turn left/right
Space to fire

REQUIREMENTS:

Java 1.7 or higher
